import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { Grid } from '@mui/material' const ViaCep = () =>{ const {register, handleSubmit, setValue, setFocus} = useForm() const onSubmit = (e) =>{ console.log(e) } const checkCEP = (e) =>{ const cep = e.target.value.replace(/\D/g,'') console.log(cep) fetch(`https://viacep.com.br/ws/${cep}/json/`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data =>{ setValue('adress', data.logradouro) setValue('neighborhood', data.bairro) setValue('city', data.localidade) setValue('state', data.uf) setFocus('number') }) } return(
) } export default ViaCep
